articles.content:
Andreas Pereira has signed for newly promoted Fulham for reported £10million fee, plus up to £3m in add-ons.
Pereira, 26, has put pen to paper over a four-year deal at Craven Cottage, where he becom… [+2135 chars]

articles.author: Adam Solomons
articles.title: Indian cops arrest conmen who set up fake IPL and streamed on YouTube to fool gamblers - Daily Mail
articles.description: A fraudulent Indian cricket league set up to trick Russian gamblers was foiled by police. Amateur players were paid £4 per game and a hokey livestream via YouTube never zoomed out
articles.content: Labourers masquerading as cricket players, clever camera angles and fake team names were all part of an elaborate hoax cricket league in western India shown on YouTube that was used to draw money fro… [+1904 chars]
